about.about-description: Pleasure to meet you! I am an IT professional with a keen interest in technology. I specialize in software development, utilizing skills such as problem-solving, self-learning, and organization to create modular and scalable code for the development of efficient software solutions.

projects.projects-adv: (Due to inactivity, the server deployed on a free platform causes an initial 20-second delay in the task app.)
projects.projects-project1-description: MERN application of task list to organize and manage daily tasks, habits and pending tasks.
projects.projects-project2-description: Weather application built with React and weatherapi to provide real-time information about the weather anywhere in the world.
projects.projects-project3-description: Stopwatch application developed in ReactJs to measure the elapsed time from a particular point to the moment it is observed.
